name: 李達生
objective:
控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design
schedule:
1-4 Fundamentals
      Thermodynamics
      Energy Efficiency
      Reynolds Transport Theorem & fluid dynamics
      Governing equations of HVAC systems
5-7 Classic control theories
      Laplace Transform
      Control stability 
      Control performances
      Transfer functions of HVAC systems
      On-Off control
      PID control
8    Mid exam
9-12 Smart control & Invert control
        Smart air conditioner 
        Smart valve & chiller system
         Inverter control 
13-15 Modern control & AI
          State space equation
          Observability and controllability 
          Artificial Intelligence (AI) - Neuro Fuzzy, GA, PSO etc.
16-18 AI assisted HVAC control
          Theoretical analysis
          Prediction of optimized setting
          Predictive control
          Unmet demand of sensors
19  Final exam
consultation: Please make an appointment with teaching assistant.
